articles.title: Warren Buffett's Apple Bet Makes Berkshire Hathaway Stock Juicier Again: Analyst Spots 15% Discount
articles.content:
Warren Buffett’s investment in Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has seen significant growth this year, with the tech giant’s stock price surging nearly 50%. This has resulted in Berkshire Hathaway’s (NYSE:BRK) (NYSE:BRK) stake in Apple, which consists of about 916 million shares, ballooning to nearly $180 billion, Insider reported.
Buffett’s Apple Bet
Buffett’s conglomerate purchased the majority of these shares for $31 billion, translating to a nearly six-fold profit on paper. The rise in Apple’s stock price is partly attributed to the investor excitement around artificial intelligence (AI), which promises to boost productivity and bolster providers’ profits.
